code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,createStore}from"redux";import profileReducer from"./profileReducer";import messageReducer from"./message-reducer";import usersReducer from"./users-reducer";import authReducer from"./auth-reducer";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import appReducer from"./app-reducer";var reducers=combineReducers({ProfileData:profileReducer,messageData:messageReducer,usersData:usersReducer,auth:authReducer,app:appReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));window.store=store;export default store;
